choiceresponse.label: This checklist is a summary of all the TO-DO items presented in the "For non-Coding Core Contributor Roles" section of the course. Use it to track that you've completed all the items.

checkboxgroup.choice: I have checked that I have appropriate access to all the tools I need to be successful.
I understand I may need to take compliance courses in the future
I will abide by the Open edX project Code of Conduct and treat every community member with respect.
